message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900000. This is a fair price considering its value to both of us. I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for your business. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $750000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $850000, which reflects the value of the product while also acknowledging your budget.  Let's find a compromise that works for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $850000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $825000. I believe that's a fair price for both of us.
